title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. A, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 12 - Attendance Of Incarcerated Persons at Judicial Hearings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. A, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 12 - Attendance Of Incarcerated Persons at Judicial Hearings

State Regulations
ยง 12.1 - Attendance of Incarcerated Persons at Judicial Hearings

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. A, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 12

Amended
eff. 12/12/2023. Statutory authority: Constitution, art. VI, ยง 28[c]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
